item.description:
All levelsbeginner to advanced-
we can work together and become local wordpress experts-
Bring your lap top!
Location at Chris Sparks house (in downtown northampton)- will email directions to those who rsvp
thurs am.

If you are new to wordpress:
wordpress.com is blog only. wordpress. org is the content management system we
use to build websites with or without blogs that use templates which we can customize and
functionality we can add via plug ins.
It requires that you have a hosting server or have installed a local server on your computer.
In either case you download a wordpress file, set up a database and link the two by altering
the wp-config file in the root directory. Then you are ready to go!

Information for setting up wordpress is here: http://codex.wordpres...

some hosting companies will do it for you and on the wordpress.org site they offer to set it up
for free if you email your ftp and account log in info.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Wordpress User Group
